item.title: Webkit (Safari) memory leak using SVG filters
item.description: The context A few weeks ago I was developing a website using NuxtJs (which is not important for the problem but the is the context 😉 ). That was a website that needs to use a few images as building blocks, the typical section separator with a shape different to a simple line, in this case, the section’s separator had 2 colors and a shadow. I decided to use SVG images for several reasons, for example the images had to adapt to different screen widths, and the images were simple (more complex than a line but simple, They were similar to 2 waves with 2 colors).
